tool_description: The Period Rashifal API delivers accurate and personalized Rashifal (horoscope) predictions for twelve Rashis, covering Aries to Pisces. Explore insights for yesterday, today, and tomorrow, or delve into comprehensive weekly, monthly, and yearly forecasts. Empower your users with astrological guidance for a deeper understanding of their destiny and future.
name: Period Rashifal API
title: Period Rashifal API

api_list.name: Get Period Rashifal for all Rashis
api_list.description: It gets rashifal for all rashis based on specific period.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/Tomorrow/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/{period}/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Period Rashifal by Rashi
api_list.description: It gets rashifal for the given rashi based on specific period.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/Yesterday/Aries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com/{period}/{rashi}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "period-rashifal-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
